item.title: [Global][Databases] - MongoDB upgrade
item.description:
Mar 24, 13:26 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Mar 13, 13:16 UTC
In progress - Some "Essential" plan services with the maintenance scheduled on March 13 faced issue during their migration. For these services, we restored the data from the latest backup done (in average one hour before the application of the maintenance).
Services initially planed to be migrated on March 14 will be rescheduled on the following days.
Sorry for the inconvenience.

Jan 30, 22:40 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/03/2023 01:00 UTC
End time : 26/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected for business and enterprise plans, a small downtime may be experienced for essential plans (less than 15mn).
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade of our MongoDB offer.

item.title: [BHS][Databases] - MongoDB
item.description:
Mar 24, 19:22 UTC
Monitoring - Our technical teams have set up a temporary solution.
The services are operational.
We will work on a permanent fix next week.

Mar 24, 13:20 UTC
Identified - Root cause : Software issue
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working to solve the problem.

Mar 24, 12:29 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 24/03/2023 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Actions like ordering, deleting, editing on Mongodb service are temporarily unavailable.
Existing services are still running properly.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
